https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ya33AhQelNAhALGZ6mQsGyj8Hw7.jpg "Arthur e o Infinito - Um Olhar Sobre o Autismo" (Arthur and the Infinite - A Look Into Autism) is a Brazilian film that tells the story of a six-years-old boy that is diagnosed as autistic. As the family reacts to the circumstances, Arthur's mother seeks ways to better understand his life. Arthur and the Infinite
